item.title: How to Build a Professional Website in 5 Days
item.description:
How to Build a Professional Website in 5 Days ðŸš€

This is how my site looks: https://greynosob.github.io/sitiogrb/

In many job applications, they ask to include a link to your personal website. Because of this, I decided to embark on a journey to create a site where I could showcase my professional background and skills. ðŸ’¼

Day 1: Choosing the Right Tool and Template ðŸ§­

At first, I tried using WordPress, but it was so frustrating and complicated ðŸ˜¤ that I sought advice and was introduced to Hugo.
